Improvements.Improvement: Replace repeated if-else statements with a switch statement
Improvements.Description: To make the code more readable and maintainable, replace the repeated if-else statements that check the `browserVersion_` with a switch statement. This change simplifies the code and improves its efficiency.

Improvements.Improvement: Refactor duplicate code into a helper method
Improvements.Description: The code to assign `expectedAlerts` based on the `browserVersion_` and `buggyWebDriver` or `htmlUnitNYI` annotations is duplicated. This code can be extracted into a helper method to avoid repetition and increase maintainability.
